attributes.action: Enable local government employees the right to take up to 1 years paid leave to work abroad in employment of their choice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By allowing our Local Council employees the opportunity to work abroad for up to 1 year on full pay, we can establish better links with the world. In turn, our local councils will benefit from increased awareness of different cultures.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
